typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Patient Name} as string,
		{Patient DOB} as string,
		Facility as string,
		Physician as string,
		{Service date} as string,
		{ICD10 codes} as string,
		{Billing codes} as string,
		Encounter as string,
		Billed as string,
		Coded as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		patientname as string,
		clinician as string,
		facility as string,
		ICD10 as string,
		billingcodes as integer,
		encounterid as integer,
		billed as string,
		coded as string,
		visitdate as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		patientname = {Patient Name},
		clinician = Physician,
		facility = Facility,
		ICD10 = {ICD10 codes},
		billed = Billed,
		coded = Coded,
		visitdate = {Service date}
	)) ~> sink1
